p: Physical spectroscopic data of the isolated compounds: 3- O-[ β- d-glucopyranosyl (1→2)- α- l-arabinopyranosyl] oleanolic acid-28- O-[ β- d-glucopyranosyl (1→6)- β- d-glucopyranosyl] ester ( 1). White amorphous powder; [α] d 20+ 7.05 (c 1.5, MeOH). IR (KBr) ν max 3398, 2988, 1728, 1066 and 1046 cm −1. 1H (600 MHz, pyridine- d 5 ) and 13C-NMR (150 MHz, pyridine- d 5 ) data, see supporting data, ( Figures S3–S7); ESI–MS m/ z 1092.5 [M + NH 4] + and 1119.5 [M + HCOO −] −.
